name: Philoptima LLC
tag_list: open-innovation, open-innovation-marketplace, community, research-and-development, open-challenges, prizes, solutions, science, solvers, seekers, grant-makers, researchers, rd, product-development, cash-awards, philanthropy
overview: Philoptima is an Open Innovation marketplace that takes research and development problems in a broad range of domains such as Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Chemistry, Life Sciences, Physical Sciences etc, frames them as “challenges”, and opens them up for scientists (researchers) to provide solutions. Challenges are backed by Prizes funded by Grant Maker companies. Cash award is given for the best solutions to reserchers who meet the challenge criteria.
